Table of Contents

Namespace osu.Framework.Graphics.Shapes

Classes

Box

A simple rectangular box. Can be colored using the Colour property.

Circle

A simple CircularContainer with a fill using a Box. Can be coloured using the Colour property.

EquilateralTriangle

A triangle which has all side lengths and angles equal.

FastCircle

A circle that is rendered directly to the screen using a specialised shader. This behaves slightly differently from Circle but offers higher performance in scenarios where many circles are drawn at once.

Triangle

Represents a sprite that is drawn in a triangle shape, instead of a rectangle shape.
